description: Water, the stuff of life, the best thirst-quencher available.
Fresh, clean water.  Truly the best thing to quench your thirst.
A sample of sewage from a treatment plant.  Gross.
Water with salt added.  Not good for drinking.
Freshly-squeezed from real oranges! Tasty and nutritious.
Pressed from fresh apples.  Tasty and nutritious.
Popular among those who need to stay up late working.
Things go better with cola.  Sugar water with caffeine added, storebrand.
Like cola, but without caffeine.  Still not that healthy.
Baby cow food, appropriated for adult humans.  Spoils rapidly.
Contains up to 8 vegetables! Nutritious and tasty.
Vegetable stock.  Tasty and fairly nutritious.
A tasty and nutritious broth made from bones.
A nutritious and delicious hearty vegetable soup.
A nutritious and delicious hearty meat soup.
A nutritious and delicious soup, made of gifts of nature.
A soup made from someone who is a far better meal than person.
Sparkling white wine, made from the world's noblest grape.
America's most popular wine, and for good reason.
The heavily disputed king of red wines.  Pairs well red meats and pasta.
Prized by collectors and adored by critics, it is one of the rarer and more elegant wines.
Made from, by, and for real Southern colonels!
In Soviet Russia, vodka drinks you!
Smells faintly of elderberries, but mostly booze.
Drinking this might make you feel like a pirate.  Or not.
Don't eat the worm! Wait, there's no worm in this bottle.
An orange flavored liquor used in many mixed drinks.
A blend of incredibly strong-flavored liquors that somehow tastes like none of them.
The surreptitious drunkard mechanic's drink of choice.
Like apple cider, only with vodka.
Best served cold, in a glass, and with a lime - but you're not that lucky.
Don't drink it.  Mixing it with ammonia produces toxic gas.
Don't drink it.  Mixing it with bleach produces toxic gas.
Water collected during an acid rainstorm.  Don't drink it.  Boiling it concentrates the acid.
Concentrated acid from an acid rainstorm.  Don't drink it.
A rare substance of uncertain origins.  Causes you to mutate.
A rare substance of uncertain origins.  Causes you to mutate.
A rare substance of uncertain origins.  Causes you to mutate.
A rare substance of uncertain origins.  Causes you to mutate.
A rare substance of uncertain origins.  Causes you to mutate.
A rare substance of uncertain origins.  Causes you to mutate.
A rare substance of uncertain origins.  Causes you to mutate.
A rare substance of uncertain origins.  Causes you to mutate.
A rare substance of uncertain origins.  Causes you to mutate.
A rare substance of uncertain origins.  Causes you to mutate.
A rare substance of uncertain origins.  Causes you to mutate.
A rare substance of uncertain origins.  Causes you to mutate.
A rare substance of uncertain origins.  Causes you to mutate.
A rare stem-cell treatment that causes mutations and other genetic defects to fade away.
Tea, the beverage of gentlemen everywhere.
Clear juice obtained by cooking fruit in a large volume of water
Coffee.  The morning ritual of the pre-apocalypse world.
Blood.  Blood.  Blood.  Blood.  You feel the urge to eat it.
A bone from some creature or other, could be eaten or used to make some stuff, like needles.
A fluid bladder from a plant based lifeform, not very nutritious, but fine to eat anyway.
Freshly butchered meat.  You could eat it raw, but cooking it is better.
A nutrient rich chunk of plant matter, could be eaten raw or cooked.
Freshly butchered from a human body.
An assortment of edible-looking wild plants.  Most are quite bitter-tasting.
Meat that's obviously unhealthy.  You could eat it, but it will poison you.
Vegetable that looks poisonous.  You could eat it, but it will poison you.
Freshly cooked meat.  Very nutritious.
A freshly cooked slice of some unpleasant person.  Tastes great.
A freshly cooked chunk of plant matter, tasty and nutritious.
Cooked wild edible plants.  An interesting mix of flavours.
An apple a day keeps the doctor away.
Sweet citrus fruit.  Also comes in juice form.
Very sour citrus.  Can be eaten if you really want.
Betcha can't eat just one.
A bag of cheap, own-brand chips.
Oh man, you love these chips! Score!
A salty treat of a snack.
Chocolate isn't very healthy, but it does make a delicious treat.
Salty dried meat that never goes bad, but will make you thirsty.
Salty dried human flesh that never goes bad, but will make you thirsty.
Bread and turkey, that's it.
A big bag of peanut butter cups...  your favorite!
Mushrooms are tasty, but be careful.  Some can poison you, while others are hallucinogenic.
Mushrooms are tasty, but be careful.  Some can poison you, while others are hallucinogenic.
Mushrooms are tasty, but be careful.  Some can poison you, while others are hallucinogenic.
They're blue, but that doesn't mean they're sad.
Tasty juicy berry, often found growing wild in fields.
Juicy red tomato.  It gained popularity in Italy after being brought back from the New World.
It's a bit tough, but quite delicious.
A tasty summer squash.
Delicious golden kernels.
Now with ONE POUND of meat and ONE POUND of carbs! Not as appetizing or nutritious as it would be if heated up.
Now with ONE POUND of meat and ONE POUND of carbs! Nice and heated up.  It's tastier and more filling, but will also spoil quickly.
It could be eaten raw if you're desperate, but is much better cooked.
Fresh wet noodles.  Fairly bland, but fills you up.
It could be eaten raw if you're desperate, but is much better cooked.
When the cheese starts flowing, Kraft gets your noodle going.
Meat encased in little dough satchels.  Tastes fine raw.
Tomato sauce, yum yum.
Olive oil, basil, garlic, pine nuts.  Simple and delicious.
Canned beans.  A staple for hobos.
Canned corn in water.  Eat up!
Yuck, not very tasty, but it is quite filling.
Canned pineapple rings in water.  Quite tasty.
A dense, sweet creamy sauce, often used in curries.
Salty little fish.  They'll make you thirsty.
Now with 95 percent less dolphins!
Blech, so gross.  Save it for when you're about to die of starvation.
A large chunk of wax, filled with honey.  Very tasty.
A large chunk of beeswax.  Not very tasty or nourishing, but ok in an emergency.
A large chunk of wax, filled with dense, dark honey.  Useful for curing all sorts of afflictions.
A deformed human fetus, eating this would be very nasty, and cause your DNA to mutate.
A misshapen human arm, eating this would be pretty disgusting and cause your DNA to mutate.
A malformed human leg, this would be gross to eat, and cause mutations.
A large ant egg, the size of a softball.  Extremely nutritious, but gross.
This looks like a blueberry the size of your fist, but pinkish in color.  It has a strong but delicious aroma, but is clearly either mutated or of alien origin.
This white flour is useful for baking.
Sweet, sweet sugar.  Bad for your teeth and surprisingly not very tasty on its own.
Yuck, you surely wouldn't want to eat this.  It's good for preserving meat and cooking with, though.
A fragrant mix of dried oregano, basil, thyme and other spices.
Mildly toxic and not very tasty raw.  When cooked, it is delicious.
A delicious baked potato.  Got any sour cream?
Healthy and filling.
A delicious baked pie with a sweet fruit filling.
A vegetarian pizza, with delicious tomato sauce and a fluffy crust.  Its smell brings back great memories.
A meat pizza, for all the carnivores out there.  Chock full of minced meat and heavily seasoned.
Meal Ready to Eat.  A military ration.  Though not very tasty, it is very filling and will not spoil.
Meal Ready to Eat.  A military ration.  Though not very tasty, it is very filling and will not spoil.
Dried leaves of a tropical plant.  You can boil them into tea, or you can just eat them raw.  They aren't too filling though.
Ground coffee beans.  You can boil it into a mediocre stimulant, or swallow it raw for a lesser stimulative boost.
Delicious sponge cake with buttercream icing, it says happy birthday on it.
Low-sodium preserved meat.  It was boiled and canned.  Contains all of the nutrition, but little of the savor of cooked meat.
This mushy pile of vegetable matter was boiled and canned in an earlier life.  Better eat it before it oozes through your fingers.
Sealed glass jar containing preserved apples.  Bland, mushy and losing color.
Low-sodium preserved human meat.  It was boiled and canned.  Contains all of the nutrition, but little of the savor of cooked meat.
Meat slices cured in brine and vacuum-packed.  Salty but tasty in a pinch.
Vegetable chunks pickled in a salt bath.  Goes well with burgers, if only you can find one.
Apple slices soaked in a sugar syrup, to preserve freshness and appearance
Spaghetti covered with a thick meat sauce.  Yum!
Spaghetti, with a generous helping of pesto on top.  Yum!
Simple cloth bandages.  Used for healing small amounts of damage.
A full medical kit, with bandages, local anaesthetics, and rapid healing agents.  Used for healing large amounts of damage.
Take frequently to improve your immune system.
Provides long lasting protection against sickness.
Low-grade painkiller.  Best taken in pairs.
No-doz pills.  Useful for staying up all night.
Prescription sleep aids.  Will make you very tired.
Iodine tablets are used for recovering from irradiation.  They are not spectacularly effective, but are better than nothing.
Daytime flu medication.  Will halt all flu symptoms for a while.
Nighttime flu medication.  Will halt all flu symptoms for a while, plus make you sleepy.
Vital medicine for those with asthma.  Those without asthma can use it for a minor stimulant boost.
A opiate, prescribed for light to moderate pain.
A strong opiate, prescribed for moderate to intense pain.
A long-lasting opiate, prescribed for moderate pain.  Its painkiller effects last for several hours, but are not as strong as oxycodone.
Anti-anxiety medication.  It will reduce your stimulant level steadily, and will temporarily cancel the effects of anxiety, like the Hoarder trait.
A strong stimulant prescribed for ADD.  It will greatly increase your stimulant level, but is quite addictive.
Anti-psychotic medication.  Used to control the symptoms of schizophrenia and similar ailments.  Also popular as a way to come down from a bad trip.
A strong anti-depressant.  Useful if your morale level is very low.
These will boost your dexterity, intelligence, and perception for a short time.  They are quite addictive.
Really useful only for relaxing.  Will reduce your attributes and reflexes.
A strong, illegal stimulant.  Highly addictive.
A very strong illegal stimulant.  Extremely addictive and bad for you, but also extremely effective in boosting your alertness.
A very strong illegal opiate.  Unless you have an opiate tolerance, avoid heroin, as it will be too strong for you.
A gentleman's vice.  Cigars are what separates a gentleman from a savage.
Medication designed to stop the spread of, and kill, bacterial infections.
Sleeping pills made by refining mutated poppy seeds.
Painkillers made by refining mutated poppy seeds..
Refined cocaine, incredibly addictive.
A powerful disinfectant commonly used for contaminated wounds.
Good old mayo, tastes great on sandwiches.
Good old ketchup, tastes great on hotdogs.
Good old mustard, tastes great on hamburgers.
A pickled cucumber, rather sour but good and basically lasts forever.
So, you kept it with you.  Not like the cops are gonna arrest you for it.  Eat you, maybe.  Arrest, no...
A human corpse, with a hole blown through it's head...  Guess he took the easy way out.
Norma Bates...  She's been dead for several years..
Pop some reds, shoot some fucking smack, shit man.  Do what ever you have to do to let me get some sleep!.
Nighttime flu medication.  Will halt all flu symptoms for a while, plus make you sleepy.
Medicine! MEDICINE! Urrrhh...  And now one for the doctor...
Mother's Little Helper.

Zombies, man? You don't even care...  This drug has been taken off the market.  Wonder how you got it.  Same drug Roman Polanski used on that poor thirteen year old girl.  HE should have been killed by the Manson family.  Not his wife.  But I digress.
The strongest prescription amphetamine legally available.  This is the stuff the Manson Family took when they slaughtered all those people way back when.
Doctors don't much like to prescribe this one very often.  Abuse potential.  Such hypocrites.  Doctors are the drug dealers of the world..
Decent bud.
The good stuff.
The good stuff.
Our Money is made of drugs.
Esctasy.  .
Decent stuff.  I mean, I've had better, *sniff*, but this is pretty good.
98% Pure Cocaine.  Straight from Montana Industries.
You pig! That was all of our cocaine! You're a fucking narcotics agent!
Really bad for you.  Like, you shouldn't take this, probably.  But, hey, it's the end of the world, isn't it? Fuck it.  You could die today, anyways.
A very strong illegal stimulant manufactured by a decent chemist.  Extremely addictive and bad for you, but also extremely effective in boosting your alertness.
A very strong illegal stimulant manufactured by a decent chemist.  Extremely addictive and bad for you, but also extremely effective in boosting your alertness.
Whole Market is made of drugs! American Money only! Our money is made of drugs.
The shredded bark of the Iboga plant.  A pure, unaddictive gift from nature.  A favorite of Edmund Musky
The Belushi Killer.  Take at your own risk.  Made with love.

1940s..  The second world war.  The Nazis invent a combat drug.  Part cocaine, part Eukodal, part methamphetamine.  This drug, codenamed D-IX, is the speed that fueled the Nazis.  Take at your own risk...
Monkey is made of drugs.
A strong illegal opiate.  Tarry and black.
An incredibly strong illegal opiate.  Unless you have an opiate tolerance, avoid this pure heroin, straight from the Golden Triangle, as it will be too strong for you.
A very strong illegal opiate.  Unless you have an opiate tolerance, avoid heroin, as it will be too strong for you.
A gentleman's vice straight from Havana.  The perfect cigar to smoke after being really good at greed.  The best way to de-stress after mergers and acquisitions, or murders and executions.
Cuban tobacco rolled into one of the finest smokables known to man.
There is nothing more depraved than a man in the depths of an ether binge...
Banana is made of drugs!
Did the mescaline kick in? Or was that Debbie Reynolds in a wig?
Are you ready for this? Checking into a zombie infested town with a head full of acid?
The acid had shifted gears on him...  The next phase would probably be some hellish introspective nightmare...
Adrenochrome...  You know there's only one way to get this stuff.  Harvested from a human body.
Try getting a fucking reservation at Dorsia now, you stupid fucking bastard!
A human head, left by someone with sick after school activities.

I killed Paul Allen with an axe.  In the face.  His body is dissolving in a bathtub in Hell's Kitchen.I even...  I ate some of his brains and I tried to cook a little.  Tonight, I uh- just had to kill a lot of people! !
A salad, with crab and tomato.
Where did this come from? It's some sort of blue-green vial of liquid.
A silver liquid.  Incredibly bitter.  It glimmers in the light.
A more purer form of smokable cocaine than crack.  Made with volatile ether.  May cause Richard Pryor Syndrome, and an inescapable urge to set one's self on fire.
A bizaare chemical rendered from refined Marloss berries.  You try it once, you're hooked for ever, but it feels so gooooood...
Jonestown Surprise...

Jet is a powerful methamphetamine that stimulates the central nervous system.  The initial euphoric rush rarely lasts more than a few minutes, but during that time, the user is filled with a rush of energy & strength.
The people want paradise...  They want Nuke.  A new designer drug..
A kilogram of uncut cocaine.  Pure columbian sugar...
A kilogram of uncut cocaine.  Pure columbian sugar...
Hospital heroin.  The smack Elvis was on when he cashed in his chips on the throne.  Really plugs you up.  No wonder he died on the toilet.
A tranquilizer commonly prescribed in the Seventies.  Very addictive.  One of Elvis's favorites.
A jar of Placidyl, an extremely addictive sleeping medication, prescribed by an inresponsible doctor..
A jar full of extremely potent pain pills...
A jar full of Dexedrine.  Lots and lots of stimulants for the King.  No wonder he had a heart attack.
A citrus flavored soda.  Favorite of neckbeards everywhere...
A citrus flavored soda.  Favorite of neckbeards everywhere...
A citrus flavored soda.  Favorite of neckbeards everywhere...
Crunchy, orange...  tasty.  There's a cheetah on the bag...
A big bag of candy corn...  your favorite!
It could be eaten raw if you're desperate, but is much better cooked.
Delicious chinese food...
Classy.  A box of wine.  $11.99 for a good amount.
Fried up, this stuff ain't so bad...
A gelatinous liquid...  Contains all the nutrition and flavor of roast beef with none of the texture.
Reconstituted roast beef from a certain restaurant chain.  Sort of appetizing?
An opiate slightly more powerful than codeine.  Prescribed in Lortab and Vicodin..
Twelve kilos of coke.  Wow...  Someone's probably looking for this.  Or dead.
Uncut Crystal Dream.  You put it in your eyes and it tells you lies.
A brand of stimulant with dubious duration.  A lot of caffeine.
A designer drug that makes people eat other people.  Perhaps this is what started this mess...
Benzedrex, is an amphetamine-like decongestant inhaler.
Benzedrex, is an amphetamine-like decongestant inhaler.
Made from, by, and for real Southern colonels!
